## Goals

If the tip is relevant to you, you can

- identify that it's relevant.
- tell in what situation you would use it.
- know how to get started.

## Anti goals

- Proscriptivism
- Any one person finding every tip interesting
- Any one tip being interesting to everyone
- Give enough context that everyone can understand every tip
- Giving every detail needed to implement the tip
